# Instead, edit the source template and/or variables, then run render_templates.bat .

SpellName = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_name_format_unique
		trigger = { exists = var:unique_spell_identifier }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_name_format_1
	}
}

# This is a fancier way of handling effect descriptions so that we can actually customize them, as opposed to the GUI [Localize(Concatenate())] method which results in completely fixed spell effect descriptions
# The old method is kept as a fallback for effect that have not been ported over to this system yet, but over time ideally we should phase out the old system and convert everything into this

		fallback = yes
	}
}

SpellEffectTarget = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_spell_organizer
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:spell_organizer }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_caster
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:caster }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_province
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target_province }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_title
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target_title }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_artifact
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target_artifact }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_province_character
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target_province_character }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_newborn_child
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target_newborn_child }
	}
}

SecondSpellEffectTarget = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target
		trigger = { var:second_target_type ?= flag:target }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_spell_organizer
		trigger = { var:second_target_type ?= flag:spell_organizer }
	}

		trigger = { var:second_target_type ?= flag:caster }

		trigger = { var:second_target_type ?= flag:target_newborn_child }
	}
}

SpellEffectTargetPossessive = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_target_possessive
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:target }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_target_spell_organizer_possessive
		trigger = { var:target_type ?= flag:spell_organizer }

	}

		localization_key = add_character_modifier_magic_magical_ice_improvement_add_modifier_modifier_desc
		trigger = {
			var:spell_tag_name ?= flag:add_character_modifier_magic_magical_ice_improvement_add_modifier
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = add_character_modifier_magic_magical_metal_improvement_add_modifier_modifier_desc
		trigger = {
			var:spell_tag_name ?= flag:add_character_modifier_magic_magical_metal_improvement_add_modifier
		}
	}
	text = {

			var:spell_tag_name ?= flag:add_character_modifier_magic_magical_sand_improvement_add_modifier
		}

	text = {

		}

	text = {

		}

		}

	text = {
		localization_key = add_character_modifier_magic_magical_dawn_improvement_add_modifier_modifier_desc
		trigger = {
			var:spell_tag_name ?= flag:add_character_modifier_magic_magical_dawn_improvement_add_modifier
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_generic_desc
		fallback = yes
	}
}

SpellEffectScalar1 = {
	type = story
	# Aspects
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_fire
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:fire }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_water
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:water }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_ice
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:ice }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_air
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:air }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_stone
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:stone }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_dream
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:dream }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_celestial
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:celestial }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_dark
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:dark }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_light
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:light }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_blood
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:blood }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_nature
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:nature }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_ethereal
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:ethereal }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_hymns
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:hymns }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_death
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:death }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_sand
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:sand }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_metal
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:metal }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_time
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:time }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_dawn
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:dawn }
	}
	# Components
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_spell_component_suitability
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:spell_component_suitability }
	}
	# Modifiers
	text = {
		localization_key = magic_arcane_degeneration_modifier_value_desc
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:magic_arcane_degeneration_modifier_scale }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = glassinger_modifier_value_desc_manual # Non-generated for now to look nicer
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:glassinger_modifier_scale }
	}
	# Other
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_development
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:development }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_num_of_known_languages
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:num_of_known_languages }
	}
	# Generic
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_none
		trigger = { var:scalar_1 ?= flag:none }
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_scaling_total_level
		fallback = yes
	}
}

SpellEffectActivationCondition = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_activation_condition_trait
		trigger = {
			has_variable_list = activation_condition_list
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = activation_condition_list
				target = flag:trait
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_activation_condition_trait_negative
		trigger = {
			has_variable_list = activation_condition_list
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = activation_condition_list
				target = flag:trait_negative
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_activation_condition_terrain
		trigger = {
			has_variable_list = activation_condition_list
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = activation_condition_list
				target = flag:terrain
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_effect_activation_condition_none
		fallback = yes
	}
}

##############
# FLAVOR LOC #
##############

RandomSpellTool = {
	type = story
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_runic_chisel
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			OR = {
				var:primary_aspect = flag:stone
				var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_sundial
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			OR = {
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
				var:primary_aspect = flag:time
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_red_sand_hourglass
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			OR = {
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
				var:primary_aspect = flag:time
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_flint_and_steel
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_candle
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_scalpel
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_star_chart
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:celestial
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_astrolabe
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:celestial
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_armillary_sphere
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:celestial
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_ski_pole
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_dowsing_rod
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:water
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_icicle
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_divining_rod
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			OR = {
				var:primary_aspect = flag:water
				var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_water_bucket
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:water
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_firefly_jar
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			OR = {
				var:primary_aspect = flag:nature
				var:primary_aspect = flag:light
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_brazier
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_tool_generic
		fallback = yes
	}
}

SacrificeDescription = {
	type = story
	random_valid = yes
	text = {
		localization_key = sacrifice_blood_1
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = sacrifice_blood_2
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = sacrifice_generic_1
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { exists = var:primary_aspect }
				NOR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = sacrifice_generic_2
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { exists = var:primary_aspect }
				NOR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = sacrifice_generic_3
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { exists = var:primary_aspect }
				NOR = {
					var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		localization_key = divination_interpretation_metal
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:metal
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = divination_interpretation_dawn
		trigger = { 
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:dawn
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = divination_interpretation_generic
		fallback = yes
	}
}

SpellAttackDescription = {
	type = story
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_light
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:light
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_water
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:water
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_fire
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:fire
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_dream
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:dream
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_darkness
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:darkness
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_ice
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:ice
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_stone
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:stone
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_air
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:air
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_blood
		trigger = {
			exists = var:primary_aspect
			var:primary_aspect = flag:blood
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = spell_attack_generic
		fallback = yes
	}
}

############
# CANTRIPS #
############

CantripOvercharge = {
	type = character
	text = {
		localization_key = cantrip_overcharge_epic
		trigger = {
			exists = var:cantrip_skill_overcharge
			var:cantrip_skill_overcharge >= 3
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = cantrip_overcharge_expert
		trigger = {
			exists = var:cantrip_skill_overcharge
			var:cantrip_skill_overcharge = 2
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = cantrip_overcharge_competent
		trigger = {
			exists = var:cantrip_skill_overcharge
			var:cantrip_skill_overcharge = 1
		}
	}
	text = {
		localization_key = cantrip_overcharge_none
		fallback = yes
	}
}
